name: Modifiers
description: Modifiers are affixes found on $(#490)$(l:amethyst_imbuement:starter_guide/scepter_guide)Scepter$() that affect spell casting and/or spell behavior. Most are naturally added as part of the $(l:amethyst_imbuement:scepter_upgrading/scepter_upgrade_tree)scepter upgrade tree$(), but a couple have imbuing recipes.
